Package com.akkaserverless.javasdk.action

Action support.

Actions can be annotated with the @Action annotation, and supply handlers using the @Handler annotation.

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ActionContext
    Context for action calls.
    ActionCreationContext
    Creation context for Action annotated components.
    ActionFactory
    Low level interface to implement Action components.
    ActionHandler
    Low level interface for handling for action calls.
    MessageEnvelope<T>
    A message envelope.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Action
    An action.
    Handler
    An action service call handler.
